title: Taehan’s Birthday
description:
There are N people and M gifts. 
Each person must receive exactly C items from a single gift. 
You can split gifts by moving items to create new gifts. 
Determine the minimum number of operations required to satisfy all people, or -1 if impossible.
input_format:
First line: N M C
Second line: M integers P[i], number of items in each gift
output_format: Single integer - minimum number of operations required, or -1 if impossible
